scripts.preinstall: cd ./backend && npm install && cd .. && cd ./frontend && npm install
scripts.lint: cd ./backend && npm run lint && cd .. && cd ./frontend && npm run lint
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.test: cd ./backend && npm run test && cd .. && cd ./frontend && npm run test
scripts.build: cd ./backend && npm run build && cd .. && cd ./frontend && npm run build
